settings.link_text: Found a better price? Get a tailored offer
Get a Free Design Session - Enquire Now

custom_css: .announcement-bar {background-color: #c9a96e; border-bottom-color: var(--colorBorder); color: #000000; font-size: calc(var(--typeBaseSize) * 0.75); padding: 10px 0; position: relative; text-align: center;}

settings.heading: Countdown
settings.text: Use this timer to create urgency and boost sales.

We understand that while we have classic and modern designs to choose from, you may be seeking a unique and distinctive option. That's why we offer a service to craft a ring unique to you. This is accomplished in three simple steps.

Step 1 - Aid in finding your style

We will assist you in your quest to discover the perfect style and design that aligns with your individual preferences. As your envisioned design starts to materialise, we will illustrate various alternatives and choices. This is also the stage at which we will consider the incorporation of your current jewelry piece or engagement ring.

Useful tip: Explore the internet for design inspirations and print them out; the images you provide can serve as a source of inspiration for your upcoming creation.

Step 2 - 3D Rendering, Personal Adjustment and Pricing

You'll have the opportunity to view a 3D representation of the custom design we've crafted for you in wax. This precise model serves as the blueprint for creating a single, unique ring that perfectly aligns with your preferences and is customized to precisely match the intended wearer's measurements. After any necessary refinements are incorporated, we will provide you with the exact pricing details, along with a range of options that suit your anticipated budget.

Step 3 - Collect and Inspect

Lastly, we will meticulously finalize the piece by hand. Following its completion, another expert will conduct a thorough assessment of the piece to ensure both its quality and adherence to the intended design. Subsequently, the appraisal report will be prepared, and we will reach out to you to arrange the collection of your exquisite new jewelry item.
